PreceptDef.label: don't care
PreceptDef.description:
Death is inevitable, should we lose an ally or slay an enemy it is not to be thought about.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists won't get any mood effects for losing other colonists.

PreceptDef.label: normal
PreceptDef.description: Death is inevitable, an incredibly sad fact of life.

PreceptDef.label: troubling
PreceptDef.description: Death is inevitable, but we prefer not to dwell on it and not be reminded of its reality as much as possible.

li.label: death is troubling
li.description: I know death is a part of life, but I just HATE being reminded of it.
